dao

Interface UserDAO

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    UserDB

    public interface UserDAO
    This class provides the specification of the methods available to create, get and update Users, Clients and Salespeople. It is implemented in UserDB.
    Author:
    oscar

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static int MAXRESULTS
      Maximum results that the class can give in an array.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int create(Client client)
      Inserts the client in the database and returns his Id
      int create(Salesperson salesperson)
      Inserts the salesperson in the database and returns his Id
      Client getClient(int clientId)
      Retrieves the Client with the specified id from the database, null if not exists.
      Client[] getClients(int salespersonId, boolean others, boolean inactives, java.lang.String filter)
      Retrieves the clients sorted by name (up to a max, if the array returned is max there may be results not listed) assigned (if not others) or not (if others, this only should be used if the user can view all clients) to a salesperson with the specified search criteria.
      Client[] getClients(int salespersonId, boolean inactives, java.lang.String filter)
      Retrieves the clients sorted by name (up to a max, if the array returned is max there may be results not listed) assigned to a salesperson with the specified search criteria.
      Salesperson[] getSalespeople()
      Retrieves all the salespeople.

      Retrieves the Salesperson with the specified id from the database, null if not exists.

      Retrieves the User with the specified email from the database, null if not exists.
      boolean setMailPassword(int salespersonId, java.lang.String mailPassword)
      Updates the salesperson with the new e-mail password and returns true if it completes the operation
      boolean setPassword(int userId, java.lang.String newPassword)
      Updates the user with the new password and returns true if it completes the operation

      Updates the user permissions with the ones introduced and returns true if it completes the operation

      Updates the client with the salesperson and returns true if it completes the operation

      Updates the user setting it as enabled or not and returns true if it completes the operation

      Updates the user setting it as enabled or not and returns true if it completes the operation
      boolean update(Client client)
      Updates the client with the same Id and returns true if it completes the operation.
      boolean update(Salesperson salesperson)
      Updates the salesperson with the same Id and returns true if it completes the operation.

    • Field Detail

      • MAXRESULTS

        static final int MAXRESULTS
        Maximum results that the class can give in an array. If an array returned by this class has more length than MAXRESULTS, there are results not given.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

    • Method Detail

      • getUser

        User getUser(java.lang.String email,
             java.lang.String encryptedPassword)
        Retrieves the User with the specified email from the database, null if not exists.
        Parameters:
        email - The email of the user
        encryptedPassword - The password of the user already encrypted
        Returns:
        The user, or null if not exists

      • getSalesperson

        Salesperson getSalesperson(int salespersonId)
        Retrieves the Salesperson with the specified id from the database, null if not exists.
        Parameters:
        salespersonId - The unique ID of the salesperson
        Returns:
        The salesperson

      • getClient

        Client getClient(int clientId)
        Retrieves the Client with the specified id from the database, null if not exists.
        Parameters:
        clientId - The unique ID of the client
        Returns:
        The client

      • getClients

        Client[] getClients(int salespersonId,
                    boolean inactives,
                    java.lang.String filter)
        Retrieves the clients sorted by name (up to a max, if the array returned is max there may be results not listed) assigned to a salesperson with the specified search criteria. The filter search if every word introduced by the user is contained in any of the following: The client number, address, town, province, country, postalCode, name, email, phone, person or notes, or the name or email of his assigned salesperson.
        Parameters:
        salespersonId - The id of the salesperson assigned to the clients
        inactives - If true, will include the old clients
        filter - The words that the clients should include
        Returns:
        A list of clients

      • getClients

        Client[] getClients(int salespersonId,
                    boolean others,
                    boolean inactives,
                    java.lang.String filter)
        Retrieves the clients sorted by name (up to a max, if the array returned is max there may be results not listed) assigned (if not others) or not (if others, this only should be used if the user can view all clients) to a salesperson with the specified search criteria. The filter search if every word introduced by the user is contained in any of the following: The client number, address, town, province, country, postalCode, name, email, phone, person or notes, or the name or email of his assigned salesperson.
        Parameters:
        salespersonId - The id of the salesperson
        others - If others, the salesperson is not the assigned to the clients
        inactives - If true, will include the old clients
        filter - The words that the clients should include
        Returns:
        A list of clients

      • getSalespeople

        Salesperson[] getSalespeople()
        Retrieves all the salespeople. This only should be used if the user is an administrator.
        Returns:
        A list of salespeople

      • create

        int create(Client client)
        Inserts the client in the database and returns his Id
        Parameters:
        client - The client to be inserted
        Returns:
        The unique clientId

      • update

        boolean update(Client client)
        Updates the client with the same Id and returns true if it completes the operation.
        Parameters:
        client - The client to be updated
        Returns:
        True if it is updated

      • setSalesperson

        boolean setSalesperson(int clientId,
                       int salespersonId)
        Updates the client with the salesperson and returns true if it completes the operation
        Parameters:
        clientId - The unique ID of the client
        salespersonId - The unique ID of the salesperson
        Returns:
        True if it is assigned

      • create

        int create(Salesperson salesperson)
        Inserts the salesperson in the database and returns his Id
        Parameters:
        salesperson - The salesperson to be inserted
        Returns:
        The unique ID of the salesperson

        Updates the salesperson with the same Id and returns true if it completes the operation.
        Parameters:
        salesperson - The salesperson to be updated
        Returns:
        True if the salesperson is updated

        newPassword - The new password already encrypted
        Returns:

        boolean setUserEnabled(int userId,
                       boolean enabled)
        Updates the user setting it as enabled or not and returns true if it completes the operation
        Parameters:

        enabled - True if it is allowed to sign in
        Returns:

        boolean setPermissions(int userId,
                       Permission[] permissions)
        Updates the user permissions with the ones introduced and returns true if it completes the operation
